text: María José Granatto (born 21 April 1995) is an Argentine field hockey player who plays as a forward for Dutch club HC Oranje-Rood and the Argentina national team. She was part of the Argentine team at the 2016 Summer Olympics in Rio de Janeiro and won a gold medal at the 2019 Pan American Games. On club level she plays for Club Santa Bárbara in Argentina. At the 2016 and 2017 Hockey Stars Awards she won the FIH Rising Star of the Year. ==References== Category:1995 births Category:Living people Category:Las Leonas players Category:Olympic field hockey players of Argentina Category:Argentine people of Italian descent Category:Argentine female field hockey players Category:Field hockey players at the 2016 Summer Olympics Category:Sportspeople from La Plata Category:Female field hockey forwards Category:Expatriate field hockey players Category:Argentine expatriate sportspeople in the Netherlands Category:HC Oranje-Rood players Category:Field hockey players at the 2019 Pan American Games Category:Pan American Games medalists in field hockey Category:Pan American Games gold medalists for Argentina
title: María José Granatto
